titleStmt.title: Heir followis the testament and tragedie of vmquhile King Henrie Stewart of gude memorie
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

notesStmt.note: Verse - I Henry Stewart, vmquhile of Scotland King,".
Identified as STC 23372 on UMI microfilm, reel 1010.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 1010 and at reel 1670 (both are British Library copy).
